content.question: Which of the following best describes the conditions under which the method works as intended?

choices.label: The method will run correctly only if it is defined in a class other than  Location.
The method will run correctly only if it is defined inside the  Location class.
The method will always run correctly.
The method will never run correctly.

content.answer: The method will run correctly only if it is defined inside the  Location class.
